name: Astrotour VR
description:
Astrotour VR is an exploration, adventure game for Virtual Reality (HTC Vive, Oculus Touch & Quest). Experience full process to space, from astronaut registration to spaceship ride. Explore known but also unknown planets and receive as much information as possible!

Main Features:

• Explore space with full interactive environment!
• Take the whole process from astronaut registration, through rocket preparation, rocket launch, to the planet observation!
• Explore bunch of interactive features in each room and level!

• Take control of the flying rocket and defend your resources!

• Use special & additional features like 3D printer or 3D pen!

Other Features:
• Simple, one-button & user-friendly controls
• Various levels from astronaut’s point of view
• Collection of planets and their characteristics
• Actions with aliens
• Rich voice over & full narration
• Multi-language support
• Education and entertainment
• Ready for kids!
